INNER_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Options are extensive, customize the HTTP login page per customer requirements.
INNER_RULE.NAME: Not Signed in <customize HTTP login>

PARAM.NAME: guest_msg
PARAM.VALUE: Dear Guest, To connect to the network, complete the fields and select Request Access button.

PARAM.NAME: message
PARAM.VALUE: Dear User, Enter your Credentials, and log in to the network.
